content.description: Mixed Route follow middle crack on right side of the pirates cove past 2 bolts through or over a wide flaring crack to join keel haul through to the shared anchor.
content.protection: Small rack, .2 - #2 camalot.  Two bolts. To shared two bolt vertical anchor.
content.location: On the right side of the Pirate's Cove climb the middle of the three cracks.  Rappel or walk off.

content.description: Climb the Beautiful patina corner past one bolt then trend right to top.  Crux at the top of the corner.
content.protection: Small Rack .2 to #1 camalot extra .4 helpful plus one bolt to 2 bolt shared anchor.
content.location: On left side of pirates cove the corner is the right most of the the 3 crack lines.

content.description: Great slab climb on fun holds, crux is the top with interesting holds and slippery feet.
content.location: Start on the nose between the patina corner Keel Haul and the double cracks of Douhitt Booty.  Follow nose trend right on upper face.

content.description: Double Cracks to intermittent crack through bulges.  The First bulge is the crux and could go on gear, but the 2 bolts preserve the best holds.  Enjoy.
content.protection: Standard Rack, .4 to #2 Camalot.  Extras .75s are helpful.  2 bolts.  If you want to skip the first bolt bring a #4.  Shared 2 bolt anchor on top.
content.location: Furthest Left route on Pirates cove.  Start on Double cracks leading toward bulges up high.  Rappel route, or walk off.

pathTokens: Laramie Peak Wildlife Habitat Management Area
